data.label: Kathmandu City
data.description: Kathmandu Valley is situated at an altitude of 1,336 m above sea level and covers an area of 218 square kilometers.

data.label: Patan
data.description: The ancient city of Patan, lying 5 km southwest of Kathmandu, is known as the city of fine arts, showcasing a rich cultural heritage.

data.label: Bhaktapur
data.description: Situated at an altitude of 1,401m, Bhaktapur covers an area of four square miles. Known as the city of Devotees, it is rich in history and culture.

data.label: Pokhara
data.description: Pokhara is a remarkable place of natural beauty, situated at an altitude of 827m above sea level and 200km west of Kathmandu.

data.label: Hill Resort
data.description: Nagarkot is a popular tourist resort in Nepal, located 32 km east of Kathmandu at an altitude of 2,175m, offering stunning views of the Himalayas.

data.label: Lumbini Tour
data.description: Lumbini is the birthplace of Siddhartha Gautam, the Shakya prince and ultimate Buddha, known as the enlightened one.
